bug.author: mzmssg
bug.summary: SSh info disappears in new job detail page
bug.description:
Organization Name: Microsoft Short summary about the issue/question: In new job detail page, ssh info will become "Not found" after a few seconds. click ssh info: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11887940/55055419-d5e2aa00-509d-11e9-8a04-35af055c2cbd.png></denchmark-link>
after a few seconds: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11887940/55055467-fad71d00-509d-11e9-9f17-2b3109f5dc57.png></denchmark-link>
OpenPAI Environment:
OpenPAI version: 0.11
